name: The Tale of Peter Rabbit with Puzzle Pictures
name_original: The Tale of Peter Rabbit with Puzzle Pictures
description:
Peter Rabbit finds his way into Mr. McGregor’s vegetable garden, from which he must escape after getting caught eating the vegetables!

FEATURES:
-26 interactive picture puzzles
-View the entire story at once, or stop at the end of each chapter and find the hidden object
- Ability to color illustrations with full array of 30 color choices.
-Option of full narration or self-reader
-Musical accompaniment
